list.name: BIOTIC-ECOSYSTEM
list.description: If Glowbert is tethered to an enemy and a teammate at the same time, it will reduce the enemy damage by x% and increase the teammate's damage by x%.
list.descriptionHtml: If Glowbert is tethered to an enemy and a teammate at the same time, it will reduce the enemy damage by x% and increase the teammate's damage by x%.

list.name: PARASITISM
list.description: Tethering to an enemy also heals Glowbert for x% of the damage dealt.
list.descriptionHtml: Tethering to an enemy also heals Glowbert for x% of the damage dealt.
